-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema db_agent
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `db_agent` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ;
USE `db_agent` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_agent`.`tb_url_store`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_agent`.`tb_url_store` (
  `url_id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `url` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`url_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 5
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_agent`.`tb_saved_items`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_agent`.`tb_saved_items` (
  `id_item` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `item_name` VARCHAR(100) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `item_price` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `tb_url_store_url_id` INT(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id_item`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_tb_saved_items_tb_url_store`
    FOREIGN KEY (`tb_url_store_url_id`)
    REFERENCES `db_agent`.`tb_url_store` (`url_id`)
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION)
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 3
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

CREATE INDEX `fk_tb_saved_items_tb_url_store_idx` ON `db_agent`.`tb_saved_items` (`tb_url_store_url_id` ASC);
